title: Article 4 : Ice sheets on the move: How north and south poles connect
description: the ice caps present in the 2 poles are influenced by changes in the sea level. this influence therefore helps to regulate the climate on earth, but global warming plays a role in this regulation, leading to the melting of the ice caps and therefore the rise in water levels.

title: Article 3 : Shifts in flowering phases of plants due to reduced insect density
description: A study has shown that insects have an effect on the flowering of plants, climate change can have a harmful effect because it will change the life cycle of insects which will no longer coincide with the flowering period and therefore the plant could no longer be polinated.

title: Article 1 :Fraction of money earmarked for COVID-19 recovery could boost climate efforts
description: the money invested for the pandemic could be used differently for the crisis against global warming, this investment could have a beneficial effect not only for the climate but also for the economy as it could create jobs

title: Article 2 : Climate change likely drove early human species to extinction, modeling study suggests
description: 6 species of the genus Homo have survived but only one species, Homo sapiens, has survived climate change, the other species have not been able to adapt and have therefore disappeared.
